attributes.action: Have a referendum on the re introduction of the death penalty now we have DNA proof of a crime
attributes.additional_details:
Now we have DNA proof of a crime there is no doubt that person is guilty.
Re-introduce the Death Penalty for Murders,Terrorist attacks {treason] and child murders.
It makes more sense than to keep them in cosy jails.
A good length of rope is much cheaper.
We put dog's that attack down in this country.
Guilty people of these crimes  are no different to a mad dog,they lost all their rights when they took a life.
